item.title: Apache Kyuubi(Incubating) Release 1.3.0-incubating
item.description: Highlight Fully verified with the latest Spark 3.0/3.1 Build on JDK11 Provide enhanced AQE in Kyuubi Spark Extensions (for Spark 3.1) Provide several auxiliary SQL functions as a supplement to Spark’s built-in Functions Major improvements of Spark on Kubernetes, include documents, integration tests, tools, etc. Support engine/session level configurable initialize SQL statements Support custom authentication implementation
